Review Name: Nice Review Description: Ac is Woking fine but unable to cool beyond 25 degrees Celsius. Could be because of oversized room or air leaks. For 230+ Square feet we need more factors to consider before deciding. Should be suitable for rooms max upto 200 square feet. Installation was not up to the mark and I feel little disappointed in this aspect. Flipkart needs to be more careful in choosing good service providers from rural areas as well apart from urban. One drawback is remote does not have light on display.
